name: Polymatch
description:
Polymatch

Rotate and match polygons to win points and beat your high score before the time runs out! Break multiple triplets to gain even more points!

Controls

The game can be entirely played with the keyboard.

  • Rotate Left: Left Arrow / A
  • Rotate Right: Right Arrow / D
  • Select next grid area: Tab
  • Pause game: Escape
Kenney Jam 2021

This game was made during Kenney Jam 2021.

  • Theme: Rotation
  • Used assets:
    • Puzzle Pack
    • Puzzle Pack 2
    • Medals
    • Top-down Tanks Redux
    • Game Icons
    • Game Icons (expansion)
    • UI Pack
    • Kenney Fonts
